While it focuses on the immersive methodology, nearly all context and purpose are anchored in established Agile and Scrum frameworks. It describes course structure, organisational assignments, and collaborative feedback—but always as related to applying or coaching within Agile/Scrum. Because of this deep framework linkage, the content does not fit the 'Miscellaneous' category, which excludes direct references to Agile, Scrum, and their practices. Penalties were applied for dimension scores due to explicit references, the depth of Agile context, and limited alignment with the true intent of the 'Miscellaneous' category.
Miscellaneous.reasoning_summary: Content is focused on immersive learning for Agile/Scrum skill development, with explicit references to Scrum certifications and frameworks. Because it is anchored in recognised Agile and Scrum practice, it does not align with the Miscellaneous category.
